item.description:
Join Wakefield Artist Connie Festo Lafond for an afternoon of watercolor painting with a twist!

Let's make paintings with straws & tooth brushes as well as our brushes. This class will be all about relaxing & having fun as the paint takes us to where it wants to go.

 

“Practicing an art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow, for heaven's sake. Sing in the shower. Dance to the radio. Tell stories. Write a poem to a friend, even a lousy poem. Do it as well as you possibly can. You will get an enormous reward. You will have created something.”
― Kurt Vonnegut


No artistic experience necessary to create your own matted masterpiece.
Fee for everything including wine is $39

 

“If you hear a voice within you say, ‘You cannot paint,’ then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.” — Vincent van Gogh
item.name: Watercolor Painting & Wine w/ a creative twist!
